title: Very curious to know why Huni picked Gragas against Afreeca
body: That out of the blue pick reminds me of when Jensen picked Zed last year & lost the game without using a single ult. Like why would Huni pick Gragas out of other top laners?

replies.body: Well, whatever the reason was it wasn't a good reason

Huni is trying too hard to prove he can play something the used to be critized for not playing

His first match up, he had an interview pretty much confirming that....
Unless the Lethality nerfs and crit buffs come very soon, I doubt we see Trist and Jinx for a little while.

From what I can understand, there were a bunch of tank bans in that game and singed would've been murdered by afreeca's comp. Combined with the history of SKT not taking certain teams seriously (Jin Air when they first came into the league being a notable one), and boom: off-meta toplaner.

idk, it might be becoming meta, a few of the pro top laners been picking gragas top lane in soloq alot.

Maybe it's not so random? who knows.
